content: make a kitty blanket to donated to a local animal shelter it s a beginner friendly pattern and great for that left over scrap yarn you will need a 5 5 mm hook and any left over medium weight #4 yarn finished measurements should be approximately 15 x 18 i do recommend calling your local shelter to see if this size is a good fit for them i have added directions on how to increase or decrease blanket size please feel free to tag me in your finished blankets i would love to see them https //www facebook com/hooksyarnsandloopsdesigns/ or https //www instagram com/hooksyarnsandloops/
